description.value:
Astral weapons command powerful spiritual energy from the Astral Plane. This rune has the same effects as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ghost Touch] rune, plus Strikes with it deal an extra 1d6 spirit damage. If used to attack a creature that's possessing another creature, this weapon deals no damage to the possessed creature. On a critical hit against a creature possessing another creature, the possessing creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:36] save or be expelled and unable to possess a creature for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Spirit damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target's spirit resistance.
